strings: <voice_0x01001D09><se_high>Princess Medea: It's been so long since I last saw Father enjoy himself like that.

<voice_0x01001D0A><se_high>Princess Medea: He's been so lonely, waiting in the wagon all
by himself while you and the others head
into town.
<voice_0x01001D0B><se_high>Princess Medea: It's this place, I'm sure of it. He feels happier here because humans and monsters live together in peace.
<voice_0x01001D0C><se_high>Princess Medea: I know we've met some friendly monsters on our travels, but they are so few and far between that people mistrust them.
<voice_0x01001D0D><se_high>Princess Medea: I suppose that's why the few who aren't hostile to humans have to live here, in secret.
<voice_0x01001D0E><se_high>Princess Medea: Wouldn't it be wonderful if they didn't have to hide <endash> if all the world were as peaceful as this. What a marvellous place it would be...
